message: Awesome speech Mr President. This is how the well mannered presidents talk and act.

I agree with your opinion on Clinton, but not with Trump. Trump will wage war and also get the rich richer. It doesn't matter anyway, because our rights will be taken away and we won't have much to live for soon. I'd rather die fighting against this tyrannical and corrupt government who doesn't have the balls to tell the people the truth, that many of the """"conspiracies"""" are true. That officials are being sold out to the richest families in the world. It's the beginning of the end.

There is no way Obama will do anything. If he does do anything it will only be more sanctions which will do nothing. Kim Whacko is just looking for a reason to start a war and he doesn't care with who.

Natural organic food interfaces with the bodies systems. Once we process or add growth hormones, pesticides, overcook it, or add ingredients that have been radiated, we alter the natural frequency of the food and thereby alter our cells at its sub-atomic structural level. Continual use of this type of nutrition throughout the years creates health hazards and chronic illnesses.
